scripts.install: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix client
scripts.deploy: cd ../.. && git subtree push --prefix part11/11-2-bloglist heroku master
scripts.deploy:full: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run install && npm run build
